LanguageData.ApparelloResearchQuilting.label: Quilting
LanguageData.ApparelloResearchQuilting.description: Techniques used to craft sturdier cloths and leather. Allows the creation of padded armor.
LanguageData.ApparelloTribalwearDesign.label: Tribal adornment
LanguageData.ApparelloTribalwearDesign.description: Unlock the crafting of some of the more ceremonial tribal wear.
LanguageData.ApparelloResearchDesign.label: Apparel design and patterning
LanguageData.ApparelloResearchDesign.description: Integral part of apparel beautification and making them fit for wear. Unlocks several new craft recipes for your tailoring table.
LanguageData.ApparelloResearchWork.label: Safety standards
LanguageData.ApparelloResearchWork.description: Work safety and hygiene is key in staying healthy. Accidents DO happen! It pays to be prepared. Allows the crafting of apparel by modern safety and hygiene standards in Tailoring, Smithing, Tinkering and Machining benches
LanguageData.ApparelloResearchLPOW.label: Apparel augmentation
LanguageData.ApparelloResearchLPOW.description: Build tinkering table to enhance some apparel. Allows the creation of more advanced apparel and equipment designed for light infantry on the machining table.
LanguageData.ApparelloResearchPrototype.label: Prototype apparel
LanguageData.ApparelloResearchPrototype.description: Study the gibberish schematics in your schematics cabinet to figure out if there's anything of worth in there.
LanguageData.ApparelloReassembly.label: Apparel reassembly
LanguageData.ApparelloReassembly.description: Reassemble some highend equipment, using less materials.
LanguageData.ApparelloResearchSF.label: Starfleet uniforms
LanguageData.ApparelloResearchSF.description: Study the starfleet uniform designs to fabricate apparel such as the fabled peaked cap.
